sourceMeaningMnemonic: Under the <radical>moon</radical> beneath a <radical>tree</radical> there is a <radical>hat</radical> filled with <radical>water</radical>. You stare down into the water and decide to stick your <kanji>knee</kanji> in it.
meaningInfo: Feel the water splash over your knee as you stick it into this hat. It fits really well, the hat is the perfect size for your knee. Now look up at the moonlight filtering through the tree above.
readingMnemonic: Suddenly, in your <kanji>knee</kanji>, you feel <reading>he</reading>at and a <reading>za</reading>p (<ja>ひざ</ja>)! Your knee is simultaneously burned and electrocuted by the hot water!!
readingInfo: Imagine the heat then the zap going through your knee. It isn't a nice heat, it's a hot heat, then BZZZT zap! Your knee was heat zapped pretty bad.
